RectZoomBehavior¶

Implements

ZoomBehavior

Constructor¶

Call signature

new RectZoomBehavior<A, C>(selector, x, w): RectZoomBehavior

Type parameters

A

Type constraint

A extends Annotation <A>

Type parameters

C

Type constraint

C extends Chart <any, C>

Parameters

selector

Type

string

x

Type

(a: A, c: C): number

w

Type

(a: A, c: C): number

Properties¶

id¶

A unique identifier for the ZoomBehavior.

Type

string

selector¶

The selector string is used as an argument to d3.selectAll(), and it should be unique such that selectAll() returns a D3 selection only to the ZoomBehavior’s intended target glyphs.

Type

string

w¶

Type

(a: A, c: C): number

x¶

Type

(a: A, c: C): number
